divs: Sighting DetailsOn this day i came out of my house to see someone who came to visit, as i was going down the front porch steps, i saw something aboe the sky, i usaully like to see the birds go by, which i thaught it was, but this one was glowing bright white orb, it was going west to north east, so kept lokking it was fast and it made a quick stop turn back to the west for about a quick second and then it shot up towards the east and went up some and disapeard, and that was it. I made sure it was not a bird or airplane. I have heard about these before, but never entered my mine that i would someday see one. I was happy to finally be a witness to see something like this. I told my family about this and we had a good disscusion on this matter. My self and my son are both ex military so we are always looking on our surrondings. You see alot of stuff in the sky, but this one for me is the best sight i have had. I'm glad it happend in 2012.
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There were no other sightings in Detroit on or around November 14th 2012
Summary: it took about 3 seconds to see this
